en.start_message:
Hello! ğŸ‘‹
I'm a bot that will help you quickly and conveniently recognize text from files and images!
Choose the text language for recognition using the buttons below.
en.info_message:
This bot allows you to recognize text from files and images and receive it in a convenient format (as a text file or message).

You can upload files in the following formats:
- ğŸ“„ documents: pdf, docx, doc
- ğŸ–¼ï¸ images (uncompressed): png, jpg, jpeg, tiff, bmp, gif
Maximum file size: 10MB

The bot supports the following languages for recognition:
- ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Ukrainian
- ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ English
- ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª German
- ğŸ‡«ğŸ‡· French
- ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡¹ Italian
- ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¸ Spanish
- ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡· Turkish
- ğŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³ Chinese (Simplified)
- ğŸ‡¯ğŸ‡µ Japanese
- ğŸ‡°ğŸ‡· Korean
- ğŸ‡§ğŸ‡· Portuguese
